name: df-lpad
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(clpad, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cn0, co(cxp(co(nat0, cfzo, co(cv(s2), cmin, cfv(chash, cv(s1)))), csn(cv(s0))), cconcat, cv(s1)))))
comment: Define the ` leftpad ` function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Aug-2023.)
